document_data.mainbody:
Larmon Greenboot was a shepherd in Red Larch during the Elemental Evil crisis.
Larmon led his sheep to graze in the Sumber Hills.
During a trip to the Hills in 1491 DR, Larmon noticed some mysterious freshly dug graves. Greatly shocked, he told the story many times at Marlandro Gaelkurs barbershop. Some adventurers hired to find a missing diplomatic delegation from Mirabar listened in and, checking the area, discovered the corpses of some members of the delegation and an Elemental Evil cultist.
